## Form.showform() method

Call another form in non modal mode

**Signature:**

```typescript
showform(form: Class<Form> | string, parameters?: Map<any, any>, container?: HTMLElement): Promise<Form>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  form | [Class](./forms42core.class.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Form](./forms42core.form.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| string | The form class or name to call. |
|  parameters | Map&lt;any, any&gt; | _(Optional)_ The parameters to pass to the form (optional). |
|  container | HTMLElement | _(Optional)_ The container to append the form to (optional). |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Form](./forms42core.form.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise containing the Form instance of the called form.
